alfredsnippet.snippet:
from matplotlib import cm
color = cm.inferno_r(np.linspace(.4,.8, 30))

import random
import pandas as pd

x = [{i:random.randint(1,5)} for i in range(30)]
df = pd.DataFrame(x)
df.plot(kind='bar', stacked=True, color=color, legend=False, figsize=(12,4))
